title: Don Sillardo
currentPhase: Content is being developed for a campaign aimed at reducing unnecessary meetings and making better use of time. The initiative encourages innovation, digitalization, and continuous learning to keep our minds energized and growing.

blockers.message: A member of the Governance team is currently working on a similar initiative, so we were asked to pause development of this project until further notice.
